en.title: STIR
en.description: Waking up to the sound of a stranger's voice never felt so right. Stir, a 60 second experience by Julia Irwin and Rebecca Lieberman. Produced by the NFB and ARTE, co-commissioned by IDFA DocLab.
en.tweet: Waking up to the sound of a stranger's voice never felt so right. Stir, a 60 second experience by Julia Irwin and Rebecca Lieberman, co-produced by @thenfb and @ARTEfr, co-commissioned by @DocLab

fr.title: STIR
fr.description: How do you wake up in the morning? Tomorrow I will wake up to a personalized message from Stir.
fr.tweet: How do you wake up in the morning? Tomorrow I will wake up to a personalized message from Stir.
